2.3.4 #Logic.Functions.rem rem

Generates a rem value from a pixel measurement, derived from the base type size.

Parameters:
  • $pixels
    The desired pixel value.
  • $context
    The font size to derive the em value from. Defaults to $base-type-size.
Source: logic/_functions.rem.scss, line 1
